objects.name: Analytic 1603
objects.description: Detection of unauthorized changes to boot configurations pointing to TFTP servers, unusual firmware loads during netbooting, or suspicious TFTP traffic. Correlation of boot config modifications, command history logs, and unexpected system image hashes provides detection coverage for adversaries attempting to persist via malicious TFTP boot images.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: networkdevice:config
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Configuration changes referencing 'boot system tftp' or modification of startup-config pointing to external TFTP servers

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: networkdevice:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Boot information log showing image loaded from TFTP server instead of local storage

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Unexpected inbound/outbound TFTP traffic for device image files

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Whitelist of TFTP servers authorized for netbooting in the environment
Detection correlation window between config change, TFTP activity, and system reboot
Expected system image hashes to validate integrity of boot images loaded via TFTP
